price: Ebia wo (de awerεhoͻ) bɛkum wo ho sε wͻnnyε agyidiefoͻ nti.
arabic: لَعَلَّكَ بَٰخِعٞ نَّفۡسَكَ أَلَّا يَكُونُواْ مُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: laʿallaka bākhiʿun nafsaka allā yakūnū mu'minīna
